usa: The Spanish Jesuit father Segura, along with seven other priests and a number of lay companions, established a mission, which, after a brief period of existence, was destroyed by the natives, the whole company being massacred excepting one Indian boy.<sup id="cite_ref-The_Powhatan_Confederacy_page_129_4-2" class="reference">[4]</sup><sup id="cite_ref-jstor.org_5-2" class="reference">[5]</sup>
